job_title: Technical Business System Analyst with Big Query (GCP)
jd:
Technical Business System Analyst with Big Query (GCP) - ITECS

About the Company

ITECS is seeking a Technical Business System Analyst with expertise in Big Query and GCP.

Job Overview

This position is for a Technical Systems Analyst with a focus on Big Query (GCP). The candidate will be responsible for product planning and execution throughout the product life cycle.

Location and Work Arrangement

Austin preferred / Remote possible.

Key Responsibilities

  • Gather and prioritize product requirements.
  • Work closely with business stakeholders, partner product teams, and technical teams.
  • Deliver Functional Specification Document, Source to Target mapping, and Technical design document.

Required Qualifications

  • 8+ years of experience.
  • Hands-on experience in SQL and Big Query.
  • Ability to write complex SQLs, generate reports, and build visualizations.
  • Good documentation skills.
  • Understanding of Payments/Finance/Tax Industry.

Preferred Qualifications

  • GCP certification or Cloud experience.
  • Hadoop knowledge/experience.
  • Strong skills in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint.
  • Experience in both agile and waterfall methodologies.

What We Offer

Competitive salary and benefits.

How to Apply

Please send your resume to sapna@itecsus.com.
